MultipleChoice.Title: will for offers and instant decisions

Content.Question:
1. It’s absolutely freezing in here!I’ll close the window.
I’m going to close the window.

2. When is the next flight?Just a minute, I’ll check on the website.
Just a minute, I’m going to check on the website.

3. Have you got any plans for tonight?Yes, we’ll go to the cinema.
Yes, we’re going to the cinema.

4. What does Janet want do to when she grows up?She’ll be a doctor.
She’s going to be a doctor.

5. I don’t want to leave my laptop here.It’s okay. I’ll look after it.
It’s okay. I’m going to look after it.

6. Oh no! I forgot to give this CD-ROM to Tom.I’ll have lunch with him so I can give it to him.
I’m having lunch with him so I can give it to him.

7. I can’t understand these instructions.I’ll help if you like.
I’m going to help if you like.

8. Are you looking forward to your holidays?I can’t wait! I’ll sit on the beach and do nothing.
I can’t wait! I’m going to sit on the beach and do nothing.

9. It’s raining really hard.I’ll lend you an umbrella.
I’m going to lend you an umbrella.

10. What is your New Year Resolution?I’ll lose weight.
I’m going to lose weight.
